SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Net Profit Margin ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Net Profit Margin  is Patent Growth Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Renewable Energy Investment Ratio?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Net Profit Margin  is Renewable Energy Investment Ratio.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Net Profit Margin } encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Zimmerman PLC?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Net Profit Margin }, while the weakest aspect is{ Energy Conversion Efficiency}.
